name: Tiny Red Bird
description:
Tinyy Red Bird is the most simple game to play!

Help Tiny Red Bird to flying through the sky trying to avoid obstacles that can kill the bird and you need to help the bird pass through it.

Tap on the screen for free falling flapping bird to fly through obstacles.

How to play:
*Tap to flap your wings to fly!!!
*Avoid the pipes!!!

Flap your wings to fly... and have fun with this great game!!!
